tag_line: See who's around from a bird's eye view.
title: Cobalt Radar
message:
[FONT=Verdana][SIZE=7][COLOR=rgb(0, 89, 179)]Cobalt Radar[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[IMG]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/237119964824207361/829468878798848030/app.png[/IMG]
[HR][/HR]Shows an overhead depiction of your car and who's around you, most useful in tight, first person racing.
[IMG]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/237119964824207361/829521816288100373/unknown.png[/IMG]
[SIZE=2](Track is Laguna Seca)[/SIZE]
[HR][/HR]Here's a video if it in use!
[MEDIA=youtube]RqP9y-OQdnk[/MEDIA]
[/FONT]
Big Thanks to Deer/Tventy for fixing the mod for 1.2 as I was pretty burnt out seeing as I hate UI/JS and all of my UI was bricked; I really didn't have the patience to open up the code and even check, so once again, thanks a ton to Tventy for fixing it!
[FONT=Verdana][/FONT]
[CENTER][HR][/HR][SIZE=5][COLOR=rgb(255, 128, 0)]Usage in BeamMP[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
[SIZE=4]You are fully allowed to use this mod in [URL='https://beammp.com/']BeamMP[/URL] as I literally made the mod for a larger sim racing mod in MP, I just have two smaller requests, if you use this on a server, please subscribe to the original post on the forum so I look good and try to keep the version on your server relatively up-to-date.
[HR][/HR]If you need to reach-out to me, I'm in both the [URL='https://beammp.com/']BeamMP[/URL] discord, and the offical BeamNG discord, my DMS are open and my @ is [B]Preston#3615[/B][/SIZE]
via: packed by repo on Mon, 06 Sep 2021 06:00:50 GMT
